title: How can someone contact IGNOU? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi there, There are multiple ways to contact someone on IGNOU, you can go online and see the contact us tabs which will give all the details and the phone numbers. Apart from this you have got your regional offices in every state of India, you can find the address or the phone numbers on IGNOU website. Or you can directly call the main helpline number of IGNOU where the staff can assist you with the contact details of your particular location/area office.

Contact IGNOU is really a headache as they don’t have proper communication system to response to every query. If you are not running out of time then take number from IGNOU - the People's University for your regional center or study center for information. If you want to take decision or you have any urgent response and time is running out then best to contact study center or regional center personaly.
